titles.title: Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 231 - 189 (Roll no. 483).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/29/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that when the House adjourns on any legislative day from Thursday, July 29, 2010, through Tuesday, August 3, 2010, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m. on Tuesday, September 14, 2010.
